name: CGI: The Game
description:
The world's first open-world action game from creative house CGI™️!

Step into the shoes of one of 7 real-life body scans of models from today's generation and take on robots aliens & monsters in this futuristic metaverse.

Utilizing stunning computer-generated imagery plus a custom soundtrack, the CGI ™️ game offers an immersive and action-packed gaming experience.

Access exclusive videos and dive into a world unlike any other. Download CGI™️ now and join the fight for survival and style in this groundbreaking new game


A GAME BY HAPPENED OVER TIME


PROGRAMMED AND DEVELOPED BY
DANTE HOLLEY
